subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A day after James L. Dolan’s impromptu meeting with his embattled team, the Knicks fell to the Toronto Raptors as fans booed vociferously and fled to the exits early.
snippet: A day after James L. Dolan’s impromptu meeting with his embattled team, the Knicks fell to the Toronto Raptors as fans booed vociferously and fled to the exits early.
